member.summary: State of the LED. If the switch does not have an LED the value is stored anyway.

member.summary: When set to true, the digiswitch will toggle the state of the LED each time it is left-clicked.

member.summary: Color of the switch. It is available in commercial version colors.

member.name: T:TurboControl.VerticalStyles
member.summary: Vertical display style

member.name: F:TurboControl.VerticalStyles.Compact
member.summary: All font lines are mapped to consecutive display lines

member.name: F:TurboControl.VerticalStyles.Scanlines
member.summary: Font lines are divided by empty scan lines of 1 pixel height

member.name: F:TurboControl.VerticalStyles.Filled
member.summary: Font lines are doubled

member.name: T:TurboControl.HorizontalStyles
member.summary: Horizontal display style

member.name: F:TurboControl.HorizontalStyles.Single
member.summary: Every font pixel covers exactly one display pixel

member.name: F:TurboControl.HorizontalStyles.Double
member.summary: Every font pixel is stretched to two display pixels

member.name: F:TurboControl.HorizontalStyles.Triple
member.summary: Every font pixel is stretched to three display pixels
